00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Init
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014

00029 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE Init
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain, ONLY : iStep, ni, now, NX, nxt, NY, tCall, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j, m, ie, iw, jn, js
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: R, rhon, phin, muPhin, lapPhi
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Af0, Af1
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ag0, Ag1, Eg1A, Eg2A
00045 
00046 
00047 ! Initialize counters
00048  now   = 0
00049  nxt   = 1
00050  iStep = 0
00051  tCall = 1
00052  eps   = 1.D0
00053 
00054 ! Set vtk limits
00055  NX = xmax - xmin + 1
00056  NY = ymax - ymin + 1
00057 
00058 ! Set initial average density
00059  rhon = 0.5D0*(rhoH + rhoL)
00060 
00061 !--------- Initialize near neighbors and order parameter phi -------------------
00062  DO j = ymin, ymax
00063    DO i = xmin, xmax
00064 
00065       phi(i,j) = -phistar
00066       DO m = 1, nBubbles
00067         R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i)-bubbles(m,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j)-bubbles(m,2) )**2 )
00068         IF ( R <= ( DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) + IntWidth ) ) THEN
00069           phi(i,j) = phistar*TANH( 2.D0*( DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) - R )/IntWidth )
00070         END IF
00071       END DO
00072 
00073 ! Neighbors array
00074       ni(i,j,1) = i + 1
00075       ni(i,j,2) = j + 1
00076       ni(i,j,3) = i - 1
00077       ni(i,j,4) = j - 1
00078 
00079    END DO
00080  END DO
00081 ! Fix near neighbours at edges (periodic boundary conditions)
00082  ni(xmin,:,3) = xmax
00083  ni(xmax,:,1) = xmin
00084  ni(:,ymin,4) = ymax
00085  ni(:,ymax,2) = ymin
00086 
00087 !--------- Calculate the equilibrium distributions -----------------------------
00088  DO j = ymin, ymax
00089    DO i = xmin, xmax
00090 
00091 ! Identify near neighbors
00092      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00093      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00094      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00095      js = ni(i,j,4)
00096 
00097 ! Laplacian calculation
00098      lapPhi = ( phi(ie,jn) + phi(ie,js) + phi(iw,jn) + phi(iw,js)    &
00099             + 4.D0*( phi(ie,j) + phi(iw,j) + phi(i,jn) + phi(i,js) ) &
00100             - 20.D0*phi(i,j) )/6.D0
00101 
00102 ! Local values of the phase and the chemical potential
00103      phin = phi(i,j)
00104      muphin = 4.D0*alpha*phin*( phin*phin - phistar2 ) - kappa*lapphi
00105 
00106 !--------- Collision: set distribution f equal its equilibrium value -----------
00107 ! Equilibrium coefficients
00108      Af1 = 0.5D0*Gamma*muphin
00109      Af0 = -2.D0*Gamma*muphin
00110 
00111 ! Equilibrium distribution for zero initial velocity
00112      f(i,j,0,now)   = Af0 + phin
00113      f(i,j,1:4,now) = Af1
00114 
00115 !--------- Collision: set distribution g equal to its equilibrium value --------
00116 ! Coefficients
00117       Ag1  = rhon + 3.D0*phin*muphin
00118       Ag0  = 2.25D0*rhon - 1.25D0*Ag1
00119       Eg1A = Eg1*Ag1
00120       Eg2A = Eg2*Ag1
00121 
00122 ! Equilibrium distribution for zero initial velocity
00123       g(i,j,0,now)   = Eg0*Ag0
00124       g(i,j,1:4,now) = Eg1A
00125       g(i,j,5:8,now) = Eg2A
00126 
00127 ! Initialize pressure and velocity arrays
00128       p(i,j)   = 1.D0
00129       u(i,j,:) = 0.D0
00130 
00131    END DO
00132  END DO
00133 
00134 ! Save initialized data
00135  CALL Stats
00136  CALL vtkPlane
00137 
00138  RETURN
00139  END SUBROUTINE Init
